name: help
useCase: Lists all the existing commands and their use. Used when you need help.⛑

name: clear
useCase: Clears everything on the screen. Used when you want to start fresh.✨

name: cd
useCase: Used to change through directories. i.e cd test folder.⏯

name: mkdir
useCase: Used to create a new directory.📁

name: touch
useCase: Used to create a new file.🖨

name: ls
useCase: Lists all the existing contents in the current directory.📃
